description:
My apartment is a large and beautiful 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Astoria. A good sized living area with separate eat-in kitchen and queen sized bedrooms. The apartment is surrounded with a lot of excellent cuisine, restaurants and bars. It's a five minutes walk to the N,Q train at 30th Avenue, about 15 minutes to Manhattan. This is a perfect apartment for anyone who is coming to NYC to work or simply wants to get away and experience this wonderful city.

15min to Midtown Manhattan
20min to Times Square

Feel free to text and ask questions/advices where to go and how to get around.
name: Charming 2 Bedroom in Astoria
review: The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
